text: Emilio Antonio Echevarría Noriega (3 July 1944 – 4 January 2025) was a Mexican actor. He was born in Mexico City. His career began in 1978. He appeared in Amores Perros as "El Chivo". He also had a role in Y tu mamá también. He has also had small parts as Raoul in the James Bond movie Die Another Day and then as Antonio López de Santa Anna in The Alamo. Echevarría died on 4 January 2025 in Mexico City, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Actors from Mexico City
title: Emilio Echevarría
